name: 6 Lines
description:
6 Lines is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.
It gives something to your brain, sweet to chew on!
6 Lines is Simple yet Addictive, Addictive puzzle meant for you.

How to play:
- Connect a flow from Green Dot to Red Dot at exact 6 Lines and create a flow
- Just watch time out for each flow

Content
* Unique Concept
* Mind Relaxing sounds
* Gamecenter Challenging
* Smooth, polished touch interaction



6 Lines is a great game to help you sharpen logic and reasoning skills whether you’re a beginner or an experienced puzzler.
Just pick this game and let the time flow!

So,what are you waiting for?download right now!
Enjoy.
